title: "Smoke-stop door" means a door for preventing or checking the spread of smoke from one area to another
clause_text: "Smoke-stop door" means a door for preventing or checking the spread of smoke from one area to another. “Solar Energy System” means a device to heat the water or generate power using solar energy.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Smoke-stop door" means a door for preventing or checking the spread of smoke from one area to another.
